title: Whitehall Lane Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, January 21, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a focused tasting highlighting the depth, balance, and classic Napa Valley style of Whitehall Lane Winery.

Tasting Fee: $25

Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded

Featured Wines:

• Whitehall Lane Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – 92 pts James Suckling, 92 pts Wine Spectator, 92 pts Wine Enthusiast – Full-bodied and polished with boysenberry, blackberry, dark tobacco, cocoa, and a firm, graphite-edged finish.

• Whitehall Lane Tre Leoni 2024 – A vibrant proprietary blend bursting with red and black currant, cherry, cocoa dust, and licorice, finishing smooth and silky.

• Whitehall Lane Rassi Cabernet Sauvignon 2023 – 93 pts James Suckling – Fresh and expressive with blackcurrant, cassis, crushed rock, dried herbs, and bright, finely integrated tannins.

Experience the elegance and consistency that define Whitehall Lane—enjoy your tasting free with any bottle purchase.
